themes: desire for applicant communication or clarification
key_phrases: give applicants a chance to resubmit their app
the stated reason i got rejected was for a question that I accidentally marked an answer that I didnt mean to
It was a tiny oversight on my part
I wish I could have maybe wrote a paragraph explaining and correcting the mistake
barriers_identified: no opportunity to correct minor mistakes in applications
solutions_proposed: allow applicants to resubmit their application
provide opportunity to explain and correct mistakes
